meaningMnemonic: This is a really humble and polite way to say "<vocabulary>to give</vocabulary>," probably because you're lowering yourself down and raising the item above your head so far that you have to point at it because if you were touching it you'd be defiling it anyways so, you know, point at it and raise it way up, you little worm on the ground.
